/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, providing a ground-level view of the surroundings. The street is lined with lush green trees, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze. Street lamps stand sentinel along the sidewalk, their presence hinting at the soft glow that would light up the street as dusk falls. Cars are parked neatly on the side of the road, their metallic bodies gleaming under the sunlight. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting long shadows and bathing the scene in a warm, inviting light. The image is a beautiful representation of everyday life in Beijing, captured in a moment of tranquility.
